posts.title: Enroll in Courses Now!
posts.description: Course enrollment for the upcoming semester is now open. Make sure to enroll early to secure your spot.

posts.title: Freshmen Orientation Event
posts.description: Welcome to the university! Join the orientation days to get familiar with the campus and meet your fellow students.

posts.title: Lecture-Free Days
posts.description: There will be no lectures on May 10th and 11th, 2024. Use this time to prepare for exams or relax.

posts.title: Online Exam Registration
posts.description: Register online for your exams. The registration deadlines are strict, and late registration is not possible.
important_dates: 2024-06-10 - 2024-06-25: Exam Registration for the 1st and 2nd Exam Periods
2024-09-02 - 2024-09-10: Exam Registration for the 2nd Exam Period (and Retake Exams)

posts.title: Credit Transfer for Foreign Studies
posts.description: Get your study credits from abroad recognized. Submit your applications by April 15, 2024.
important_dates: until 2024-04-15: Credit Transfer for Foreign Studies
until 2024-04-15: Registration for Guest and Part-Time Students
